comments:
org.eclipse.pollinate.core.builder.PollinateBuilder.invokeAPT(..) tries to 
invoke the compile method of com.sun.tools.apt.Main.compile with only a String 
array. In the latest update of j2se 5.0 there is no compile method with that 
signature. As far as I can see there are only the following:

compile(String as[], AnnotationProcessorFactory annotationprocessorfactory)
compile(String as[], Context context) 

This makes it impossible to create a web project. I've included the stact trace 
of this problem when creating a web app.
Good luck,
leander

I

Changed the builder to use the new process(...) entry point. Note this means
1.5.0_01 must be used; i.e., not 1.5.0.
*** Bug 82093 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
